column1: david s kuropas| david s. kuropas
column2: age 60. beloved son of stanley and eleanor; loving brother of robert (bridget) kuropas and the late charlene jendrach; cherished uncle of danny
column7: and dawn; loved by many family and friends. visitation tuesday 3 to 9 p. m. at richard modell funeral home & cremation services
column9: with a service at 8:00 p. m. interment private. go chicago blackhawks! (773)767-4730 or www. rjmodellfh. com
